atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use @theme to define custom theme values in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Use @utility to define custom utility classes in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @variant
atDirectives.description: Use @variant to define custom variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use @custom-variant to define custom variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @reference
atDirectives.description: Use @reference to import Tailwind definitions without duplicating CSS.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use @config to specify a path to your Tailwind config file.

atDirectives.name: @source
atDirectives.description: Use @source to specify content sources for Tailwind CSS v4.
